articles.description: Cricket News: India's batsman Ishan Kishan conveyed his disappointment at missing multiple matches in the just-concluded ICC ODI World Cup 2023 held in India. Despi
articles.content: 'Were very grateful..: Suryakumar Yadav hails PM Modi for motivating Team India in dressing room after World Cup final

articles.author: Rajeswari Parasa
articles.title: Fact Check: Mitchell Marsh Viral Photo Edited To Claim He Did Not Rest His Legs On World Cup Trophy - ABP Live
articles.description: A post shared by a Facebook user in Telugu claimed that the original photo showed Mitchell Marsh resting his feet on a stool, and not on the World Cup Trophy, after the final match that Australia won.
